ingredients.item: 250g LOVE Life Brown Basmati & Wild Rice
600g tub LOVE Life Chargrilled Mediterranean Vegetable Soup
400g can essential Waitrose Kidney Beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the leeks for 2-3 minutes.  Add the Cajun seasoning and rice and cook for 1 minutes.   Stir in the soup, parsnips, sweetcorn, kidney beans and a little of the stock, then cover and cook gently for 35-40 minutes, occasionally adding extra stock until the rice is tender.  Season to taste before serving.
